property.name: Text
property.value: When guarding, Temple High Guard gains Melee +2 and may counterstrike first (the Counterstrike Step is moved to just after the Declare Attack Step).

property.name: Text
property.value: Unstable Fire Imp may only makes the Blazing Burst attack if he is attacked and destroyed.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Victorian Griffin has the Flying trait, enemy creatures in its zone are hindered and the also lose and cannot gain the Elusive trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: All creatures must pay 1 mana during the Declare Attack Step when making a melee or ranged attack

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever a creature comes into play, which you control, you may place a Guard marker on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ballista starts with 1 Load token on it. Each Upkeep Phase, place 1 token on it (to a maximum or 2). Before or after any friendly Action Phase, you may remove 2 tokens to make its attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: All creatures within 2 zones of Gravikor lose, and cannot gain, the Flying trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: If this zone has a friendly outpost in it, friendly soldier creatures may use a single move action to move up to 2 zones, to or from this zone and another zone with a friendly outpost in it. They move directly to the other zone, ignoring intervening walls and zones.

property.name: Text
property.value: All objects in Raincloud's zone gain the Flame -2, Acid -2, and Regenerate 1 traits. Each Upkeep Phase you may remove 1 Burn condition or 1 Corrode condition, from 1 object in Raincloud's zone by paying its removal cost. Once per round, immediately before or after any friendly Action Phase, you may pay 1 mana to move Raincloud 1 zone and attach it to that zone.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Blocks LOS, Passage Blocked, Incorporeal, Extendable

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Upkeep Phase you may pay mana to reinforce Wall of Force. For each mana spent remove 1 damage from it. The ability bypasses the Finite Life trait.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Blocks LOS, Passage Attacks, Incorporeal, Wind +2, Extendable

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, if this creature makes a melee or ranged attack, you may re-roll all of the attack dice, or the effect die, for that attack. Or, if the attack has to roll to hit (such as with a Daze condition), you may re-roll that die roll instead. Use a ready marker to keep track of this ability. [ReadyMarker]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Melee +2 trait. [Melee +2]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature is Restrained, and gains the Unmovable trait. Uncontainable creatures can be Restrained by Bind Spirit.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Obscured trait. Each time this creature is Hit by an attack, destroy Blur unless you pay 1 mana. Blur cannot be revealed during an Action Phase or Quickcast Action. [Obscured]

property.name: cAttacks
property.value: name=Blinding Aura;action type=Damage Barrier;damage type=Light;dice=1;effects={11: ['Stun'], 5: ['Daze']};Unavoidable=True;Ethereal=True;+2 vs. Nonliving=True

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains a Damage Barrier.

property.name: Text
property.value: The first melee attack this creature makes each round gains the Piercing +3 trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature loses, and cannot gain, Melee +X traits.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Upkeep Phase, the controller of Life Link may heal up to 3 damage from this creature and place it on himself as direct damage, regardless of distance or LoS.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Charge +2 trait. Its melee attacks gain the Piercing +1 trait. [Charge +2]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature's melee attack gain the Mana Transfer +1 trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Upkeep Phase, place a point of direct poison damage on each Living creature in this zone (including this creature).

property.name: Text
property.value: This conjuration gains Armor +1 and Innate Life +4.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may reveal Stumble when this creature is activated. It stumbles and may not take a move action during its action phase. Then, destroy Stumble. Has no effect on creatures with the Unmovable trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever your Mage summons a creature, he may place it in Summoning Circle's zone instead of his own zone, regardless of range or LoS.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature is melee attacked you must reveal Shock. After the attack, the attacker receives the Staggered condition. Then, destroy Shock.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a Nonliving creature enters this Mage's zone, it receives 1 direct light damage. At the end of this Mage's Action Phase, each Nonliving creature in his zone receives 1 direct light damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains Armor +2 and the Acid -3 trait. [Armor +2] [Acid -3]

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains +2 to the effect die roll for all melee and ranged attacks he makes that deal wind damage. If he makes multiple attacks in the same round, all of them receive this bonus. [Wind] [+2]

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, this Mage may re-roll all of the attack dice (but not the effect die) of one ranged attack he makes (including attack spells). If the attack action makes multiple attacks (such as a zone attack), he must choose just one attack to re-roll.

property.name: cAttacks
property.value: name=Mighty Bash;action type=Quick;range type=Melee;range=(0,0);dice=4;+2 vs. Corporeal Conjurations=True||name=Returning Throw;action type=Full;range type=Ranged;range=(0,1);dice=3;effects={8: ['Slam']}

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains Armor +2 and the Hydro -2 trait. [Armor +2] [Hydro -2]

property.value: name=Meditate;action type=Full;Add 3 mana to your mana supply=True

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Meditate: [Full] [Add 3 mana to your mana supply]

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage may choose one additional spell during the Planning Phase. This gives him an additional spell choice each round (it does not give him an additional spell action).

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever a spell cast by this Mage, or an enchantment controlled by this Mage, provides healing for an object, other than the Regenerate trait, he may increase that amount of healing by one. He may use this ability once per round. If he heals multiple objects (such as with a Group Heal), he only get the +1 bonus for one object of his choice.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains the Lighting +1 trait, a Damage Barrier, and Armor +2. [Armor +2]

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains a Defense. Whenever this Defense successfully avoids an attack, Spiked Buckler's attack gains the Counterstrike trait until the end of that attack sequence. [Defense 8+ 1x No Ranged]

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Upkeep Phase place a Storm token on Staff of Storms up to a maximum of 4. Whenever you make a wind or lightning attack, during the Roll Dice Step you may remove any number if Storm tokens to roll 1 additional attack die, and gain +1 to the effect die roll, per token removed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains Armor +2 and the Lightning -2 trait. [Armor +2] [Lightning -2]

property.value: name=Healing Light;cost=2;action type=Quick;range type=Ranged;range=(0,1);damage type=Light;dice=2;Heal target Living creature the amount rolled.=True||name=Cleansing Light;cost=X;action type=Quick;range type=Ranged;range=(0,1);effects={}

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Healing Light: [Cost=2] [Quick] [Ranged:0-1] [Light] [Dice=2] [Heal target Living creature the amount rolled.] Cleansing Light: [Cost=X] [Quick] [Ranged:0-1] [Remove 1 Condition marker from target Living creature. X = its removal cost]

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, this Mage may cast one of the 2 quick spells shown above.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target Non-Mage Living Creature heals the amount rolled on 2 attack dice. heal the caster of this spell the amount rolled on 2 attack dice.

property.name: Text
property.value: Remove as many psychic, Daze, or Stun conditions as you wish from the target, paying the removal cost for each one. Then, destroy as many revealed psychic enchantments from the target as you wish, paying the total mana cost (casting and reveal cost) for each one.

property.name: Text
property.value: Destroy the target. X = total mana cost of target enchantment (casting plus reveal cost).

property.name: Text
property.value: Target's next melee attack this round gains the Ethereal trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Heal target creature the amount rolled on 5 attack dice.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target creature the Bloodthirsty +2 trait until the end of the round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target's next melee attack this round, if it has no damage type, and no effect die roll, gains all of the attack bar characteristics above; the flame damage type, an effect roll, and the Defrost trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target's next melee attack this round, if it has no damage type, and no effect die roll, gains all of the attack bar characteristics above; the lightning damage type, and an effect roll.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target creature is Teleported to the target zone. X = 3 mana per zone moved away from its current zone. You must pay at least 3 mana even if target is Teleported into the same zone. This does not count as a move action for the creature.
